StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: M.C.A. with professional experience of over 2 years; currently associated with Quadra Four Technologies Proficient in Machine Learning and Data Science & Deep Learning Hands-on in End-to-end Capability & Creation of Data Sciences Capability based initiatives across the organization Administered the Dedicated Python Development right from requirement analysis till documentation Developed process-automation tools using Prediction Models and built up algorithms to automate operational Tasks Proved knowledge in applications such as Python, JAVA, C++, Hadoop, PySpark, Spyder Have an in-depth understanding of Artificial Intelligence Statistical Data Analytics, Predictive Modelling, and Agile Development Assisted in the development and integration of various models such as computer vision-based deep learning model using Data Science Libraries & Convolutional Neural Networks.
